price: Kwani hakuwa yeye tone ya manii lilio shushwa?
arabic: أَلَمۡ يَكُ نُطۡفَةٗ مِّن مَّنِيّٖ يُمۡنَىٰ
footnotes: Kwani yeye mtu hakuwa ni tone tu ya manii, ilio jaaliwa kuwemo katika tumbo la uzazi?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: alam yaku nuṭ'fatan min maniyyin yum'nā
